get.description: Returns the top Bitlinks created by you with traffic, that did not also have non-organization traffic in the same time period, ordered by clicks.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: a tracking or e2e domain for this organization. May be specified more than once, or omitted for all domains.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: an integer hour offset from UTC (-14..14), or a timezone string. default:America/New_York

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: hour | day | week | month default:day

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: an integer representing the time units to query data for.

parameters.name: unit_reference_ts
parameters.description: an epoch timestamp, indicating the most recent time for which to pull metrics. default:now

get.description: Returns the number of clicks on Bitlinks created by your organization or by other Bitly users that point to your domains.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: filter to a tracking or e2e domain for this organization. If unspecified, aggregate of all domains in this organization is pulled.

parameters.name: login
parameters.description: an account in this organization. If unspecified, aggregate of all accounts in this organization is pulled. ! is a valid option to exclude the organizations Bitlinks.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: an integer hour offset from UTC (-14..14), or a timezone string. default:America/New_York

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: hour | day | week | month default:day

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: an integer representing the time units to query data for.

parameters.name: unit_reference_ts
parameters.description: an epoch timestamp, indicating the most recent time for which to pull metrics. default:now

get.description: Returns the top links shared by both your audience and by your account, ordered by clicks.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: a tracking or e2e domain for this organization. May be specified more than once, or omitted for all domains.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: an integer hour offset from UTC (-14..14), or a timezone string. default:America/New_York

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: hour | day | week | month default:day

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: an integer representing the time units to query data for.

parameters.name: unit_reference_ts
parameters.description: an epoch timestamp, indicating the most recent time for which to pull metrics. default:now

get.description: Returns the top-performing organization members ordered by clicks or shortens.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: a tracking or e2e domain for this organization. May be specified more than once.

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: either clicks or shortens. Default is clicks.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: an integer hour offset from UTC (-14..14), or a timezone string. default:America/New_York

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: hour | day | week | month default:day

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: an integer representing the time units to query data for.

parameters.name: unit_reference_ts
parameters.description: an epoch timestamp, indicating the most recent time for which to pull metrics. default:now

get.description: Returns the top links shared by your audience, but not by you, ordered by clicks.

parameters.name: an epoch timestamp, indicating the most recent time for which to pull metrics. default:now
parameters.description: hour | day | week | month default:day

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: a tracking or e2e domain for this organization. May be specified more than once, or omitted for all domains.

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: an integer hour offset from UTC (-14..14), or a timezone string. default:America/New_York

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: hour | day | week | month default:day

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: an integer representing the time units to query data for.

parameters.name: unit_reference_ts
parameters.description: an epoch timestamp, indicating the most recent time for which to pull metrics. default:now
